Section: Core capacity: TO RELATE AND TO MOBILISE
Question:
Core capacity: TO RELATE AND TO MOBILIZE
The branch invests in constructive, formal and informal dialogue and partnership with its stakeholders, and mobilizes the necessary human, financial and material resources in a planned and sustainable way.

Question:
Core capacity: TO PERFORM
The branch delivers a range of sustainable activities that are perceived as relevant, appropriate (timely and of high quality, in line with its mandate) and sufficient by communities and other stakeholders.
